title: Player support Bot
body: Does human support not exist? I request human support because I thought “Blitzcrank bot” didn’t assess my situation fairly. Lazy support team?

replies.body: Generally, Blitzcrank Bot will only deal with clear-cut cases, the things that are simple and straightforward (requesting account data is a good example). In order to get a human support agent, you should only need to respond to the ticket (requesting a human agent certainly makes it clear what you want), and you should get a human support agent who is ready to address your case.
